```{r include=FALSE}
library(xfun)
xfun::pkg_load2(c('base64enc', 'htmltools', 'mime'))
```

```{r include=FALSE}
embed_var <- function(x, ...) {
  # f = tempfile(fileext = '.rds')
  f = paste("fitting-data-", Sys.Date(), ".rds", sep = "")
  saveRDS(x, f)
  xfun::embed_file(f, ...)
}
```
